message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $160, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great product, and I think you'll really enjoy it!

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $160 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm happy to pay $130, which is a fair price for both of us. Let's see if we can make this work.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. I can do $155, but I'm starting to think that John might be interested in the product if we don't come to an agreement soon.
